figure_1: Regression of Affect Ratings on Resilience for Nostalgia and Control Conditions. Vertical dashed lines indicate Johnson–Neyman region of significance borders. Scatter shows distribution of participant scores in nostalgia (red) and control (blue) conditions.
figure_2: Regression of psychological benefit ratings on resilience for nostalgia and control conditions. Vertical dashed lines indicate the Johnson–Neyman region of significance borders. Scatter shows distribution of participant scores in nostalgia (red) and control (blue) conditions.
